/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with vibrant advertisements and signs, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cityscapes. The street itself is a hive of activity, with people and vehicles moving about, going about their daily routines. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the energy and dynamism of the city.
